headline: Streaming Analytics Forecast Report 2025: A $7.75+ Billion Market by 2030, Driven by Expanding Statistical Computation, Rising IoT Data Flows, and Demand for Scalable Integrated Platforms
summary: The streaming analytics market is set to surge from USD 4.34 billion in 2025 to USD 7.78 billion by 2030, marking a CAGR of 12.4%. Driven by IoT expansion, edge computing processes vast data streams near the source, optimizing bandwidth and latency for critical applications like autonomous vehicles. AI/ML platforms lead growth, offering real-time insights across sectors such as retail and telecom. Cloud deployment dominates, offering scalability and cost efficiency.
